data.actual_result: The button isn't greyed out/in a lighter colour.
data.expected_result: The button is greyed out because you cannot create an invite link for a DM.
data.short_description: The "Create Instant Invite" button on the invite modal of a invite that is expired doesn't grey out in a DM (or a server where you don't have permission to create invites).
data.steps_to_repro: - Create an invite. - Paste it in a DM/a server where you don't have permission to create invites. - Revoke the invite. - Force close and restart Discord. - Observe the invite.
